data.title: Teach AI
data.text: Developing an AI-driven teacher for a GenAI-powered accelerated learning platform, focused on teaching Data Structures and Algorithms in Python. (Currently under development, open to rebranding :P)

data.title: National Website and Data Portal for Climate Smart Commodities
data.text: National database and registry for USDA to drive data-driven decisions for stakeholders working with climate-smart commodities, supporting a $3.1B grant for Net Zero Carbon transition.

data.title: Geoscience Community Analysis Toolkit (Open Source)
data.text: National Center for Atmospheric Research initiative involving development of parallel Python routines for scalable data analysis and visualization of Earth System Science data, tested on HPC clusters at IITM.

data.title: Reddit Network Sentiment to Predict Cryptocurrency Price
data.text: ETL workflow and linear regression ML model to analyze social media sentiment and predict cryptocurrency price movements, assessing author-author relationships through graph analysis.

data.title: Machine Learning for Advanced User Authentication
data.text: Ensemble techniques including Random Forest, Logistic Regression, and one-vs-all classifiers for user authentication, leveraging smartphone sensor data  for identification and anomaly detection.

data.title: High Performance Computing Cluster (HPCC)
data.text: Developed, optimized and benchmarked an in-house HPC cluster with GPU-enabled processing to accelerate AI/ML workloads and support parallel application testing.

data.title: Neural Network based Snake AI
data.text: A reward-based neural network AI which always wins(sometimes).

data.title: Personalized Classic Games
data.text: Recreated classic games Snake and Frogger with personalized boundary conditions and custom graphics, for fun and learning purposes.

data.title: IDPS for SQL Injection Attacks
data.text: Security layer for detecting and blocking SQL injection attacks using Signature and Anomaly Based Models with  attacker data retrieval for forensics.
